content: Someone needs to inform Trump he is not president yet and he is not a King. Homeland seecurity needs to give him the middle finger. Sorry about that I don’t usually get that low, but when you have Trump (sorry he is not my president) who acts like he is five, you need to be very stern, and say “No, Donald,” you can’t have that. He will whine and call you names; then he forget it and go on to the next thing. Please someone show him the door.
